value.stringValue: Linked Subscription Already Charged - Please Review Below
The Subscription Start Date needs to be greater or equal to today's date.
The Billing Subscription is linked to a different Account than the Opportunity.
This Opportunity needs a linked Product Environment before first purchasing.
This Opportunity is not linked to a Zuora Billing Subscription.

decisions.description: Makes sure stage is in Application/Approval which is the only stage this flow can be executed from
decisions.name: Stage_Evaluation
decisions.label: Stage Evaluation

Flow.description: Screen flow that enables sales reps to add discounts to a converted deal and/or adjust the subscription start date in Zuora if needed. Works for an opportunity where the firm is billed out of Zuora. -- auto-adds SKUs based on Zuora subscription

formulas.name: f_MainProductFP_mismatch
formulas.expression: IF( OR ( {!Product_Picker_Evaluation_Against_Subscription.QuantityMatch} = FALSE, {!Product_Picker_Evaluation_Against_Subscription.TierMatch} = FALSE), TRUE, FALSE )

formulas.name: fp_Validation
formulas.expression: IF( {!Get_Opportunity.Record_Type_Name__c} = "MyCase", IF( AND( {!Product_Picker_Evaluation_Against_Subscription.QuantityMatch} = TRUE, {!Product_Picker_Evaluation_Against_Subscription.TierMatch} = TRUE, {!Product_Picker_Evaluation_Against_Subscription.AddOnMismatch} = FALSE ), TRUE, FALSE), IF( {!Product_Picker_Evaluation_Against_Subscription.QuantityMatch} = TRUE, TRUE, FALSE) )

Flow.label: Opportunity: First Purchase Flow

fields.name: billing_cycle_change_display
fields.fieldText:
Alert: You will be changing this firm from a {!Product_Picker_Evaluation_Against_Subscription.subscribedBillingCycle} to a {!Product_Picker_Evaluation_Against_Subscription.OpportunityBillingCycle} billing cycle.


Confirm by clicking Next to continue or Cancel to update the Product Picker.

fields.name: chargedMatchDisplay
fields.fieldText: Ensure Product Picker matches subscription below and all Required Fields are populated before moving to Closed Won.

fields.name: FP_confirmation
fields.fieldText:
Confirm Updates


{!Get_Opportunity.Account.Name} will have their subscription start on: {!f_FirstPurchaseDate}


{!DiscountValidationText}


If the start date above is not the intended subscription start date, select Adjust Date below, enter the intended start date and click Next.


Otherwise just click Next to process billing updates in Zuora.

fields.name: validationHeader
fields.fieldText: Please Update Product Picker and Try Again

fields.name: issueDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Error


{!varIssue_AlertRep}


Reach out in #help-sales-ops if needed.

fields.name: slackConfirmationDisplay
fields.fieldText:
You will receive a Slack confirmation from Workbot when any of the following have been processed in Zuora that are applicable to your deal:


  • Sales Approved or Company Promotion Discounts Applied
  • ABA or State Bar Discount Applied
  • Subscription Start Date Update Confirmation and Success or Failure of Card Change if Start Date is today﻿

fields.name: txt_Instructions_summary
fields.fieldText:
Above is what the firm has subscribed to in app, along with the quantity of users and the current subscription start date.


You do not have to action this flow. It can only be used for the following without having to create a billing case:

  1. Change a firm from Monthly to Annual or Annual to Monthly on the same tier they subscribed to.
  2. Automatically add discounts.
  3. Adjust the Subscription Start Date (First Purchase Date) and charge the firm right now if adjusted to today's date

If anything doesn't match between the Product Picker and the firm's Subscription you'll be alerted and brought back to this screen.

fields.name: fp_options_selection_display
fields.fieldText: To modify the Start Date (FP Date), select Update Start Date, enter the date and click Next.

validationRule.errorMessage: Start Date must be greater or equal to today's date

variables.description: Display to user based on evaluation of SKUs and subscription
variables.name: SKU_Match_Alert

variables.description: text variable to assign specific alert to rep
variables.name: varIssue_AlertRep

variables.description: Set to TRUE if opp has main SKU
variables.name: varOppHasMainSKU

variables.description: record variable to update the opportunity
